p: The Longitudinal Health Insurance Database (LHID) is a subdataset of the National Health Insurance Research Database (NHIRD), which maintains anonymous claims data from Taiwan's National Health Insurance (NHI) program. The LHID 2000 contains all longitudinal claims data of 1,000,000 individuals randomly sampled from the registration data of beneficiaries of the NHI program during the period 1996â€“2000.
